name: BADA SOCH NEWTON
description:
Help Newton & Change the 'FoodieZ WORLD' #tag Bada soch

Hello I am Souvik Mandal, I make for #Bada soch game Jam. I made in given time on the jam. This is on the thik of Bada soch.

Name of the android game is - 'BADA SOCH NEWTON' 

The game is inspired by Newton's apple, 1st law of motion and gravity, #tag Bada Soch game jam(Thanks to  Nikhil Malankar). 

It is a endless fun game based on a funny story. Every time you start, you may find new backgrounds.... 

Please try it, I hope you will enjoy the game idea and keep making the highest score.... (I made this game on pocket code app(because of my dead laptop). Still  I tried to give my best, please let me know if there any bug. I will try to fix them.

This is 1st time I have joined game jam, kindly let me know if there any inconveniences)

The start with funny conversation where, Newton was thinking about a mysterious apple. When he saw you, He welcomes you and telling you about his thought. In middle of the conversation Einstein keep irritating him by saying #BADA SOCH #BADA SOCH. Now Newton ask you to help and start the game.

In this game you have to collect fruits to help Newton to create the best JAM which is going to change the entire 'FoodieZ WORLD'. Avoid bombs to save Newton. Collect Golden Apple and use it to revive Newton and continue the game.

🐣Scoring system- 

Collect Fruits= 1 JAM point Golden Apple= 5 JAM point To Revive = 10 Golden Apple

🐣Instructions- 

Click on the screen to disappear the initial massage. 

Btn-Play= to start the game

Btn-Play again = play again

Btn-Exit = to exit & go home

Btn-💬= About and Instructions

Btn-📀= Erase progress data

Btn-Next= next conversation

Btn-Skip= skip conversation

Btn-▶️= move Right

Btn-◀️= move Left

Btn-⏸️/▶️= Play/pause

Btn-Revive= to Revive

Btn-No= to ignor Revive
